alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Lagrange; Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:33AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Steuben, northeastern Elkhart, Lagrange, St. Joseph and Branch Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1133 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Union City to near Sturgis to near Topeka. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Union City around 1145 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bronson and Coldwater. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 15 and 21. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 101 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Indiana...and southwestern Michigan.
